name: MagIQtouch®smarthomeintegration
0:
”Alexa, set the Cooler to 20 degrees”
”Alexa, turn on the Heater”
”Alexa, turn off the fan”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the MagIQtouch Wi-Fi smart voice skill and Alexa, you can run your MagIQtouch Wi-Fi compatible heating and cooling with your voice or remotely using the MagIQtouch Wi-Fi smart app on your smart devices.
The MagIQtouch Smart home integration skill requires a MagIQtouch Wi-Fi wall controller, Wi-Fi smart app controller and MagIQtouch account to operate. 
The following MagIQtouch heating and cooling appliances include;
-Breezair EXS & EXQ Evaporative Coolers
-Braemar Evolution, SuperStealth Invertair, Paradigm & BMQ Evaporative coolers
-Braemar Ecostar, Supernova & Rebuff Ducted Gas Heaters
-Braemar Inverter and SACC Add On Coolers
-Climate Wizard CW3 Dual System
-Coolair CPQ Evaporative Coolers

Start by ‘Enabling’ this skill to link your MagIQtouch Wi-Fi smart app account, and say “Alexa, discover my devices”.
Simple, now you are ready to interact with Alexa and use your voice to express your cooling or heating needs throughout your home. 
Syncing with the innovative MagIQtouch wall controller, you can:
-request a live status of your system,
-turn the system on/off
-adjust temperatures
-adjust fan speeds
-fully control room zoning

Depending on your installation, examples of voice control include;
Ducted Gas Heater (no zones)
“Alexa, what is the temperature in my house?”
“Alexa, turn on / off the Heater.”
“Alexa, set the Heater to <XX> degrees.”
“Alexa, increase/decrease the thermostat (by <XX> degrees).”
“Alexa, turn on / off the fan.”
“Alexa, set the fan to <XX> percent.”

Ducted Gas Heater with zones
“Alexa, what is the temperature in <Zone Name>?”(Only applicable when Slave wall controllers or Air Sensors are installed)
“Alexa, turn on / off the Heater.”
“Alexa, turn on/off <Zone Name>.”
“Alexa, set <Zone Name> to <XX> degrees.” (Only applicable when Slave wall controllers or Air Sensors are installed)
“Alexa, what is <Zone Name> set to?” (Only applicable when Slave wall controllers or Air Sensors are installed)
 “Alexa, turn on / off the fan.”
“Alexa, set the fan to <XX> percent.”

Evaporative Cooler
“Alexa, what is the temperature in my house?”
“Alexa, turn on / off the Cooler.”
“Alexa, set the Cooler to <XX> degrees.”
“Alexa, increase/decrease the cooler (by <XX> degrees).”
“Alexa, turn on / off the fan.”
“Alexa, set the fan to <XX> percent.”

Evaporative Cooler + Ducted Gas Heater (no zones)
“Alexa, what is the temperature in my house?”
“Alexa, turn on / off the Cooler.”
“Alexa, set the Cooler to <XX> degrees.”
“Alexa, increase/decrease the cooler (by <XX> degrees).”
“Alexa, set the Heater to <XX> degrees.”
“Alexa, increase/decrease the heater (by <XX> degrees).”
“Alexa, turn on / off the Heater.”
“Alexa, turn on / off the fan.”
“Alexa, set the fan to <XX> percent.”


Ducted Gas Heater + Add-On Cooler (no zones)
“Alexa, turn on / off the Cooler.”
“Alexa, set the Cooler to <XX> degrees.”
“Alexa, increase/decrease the cooler (by <XX> degrees).”
“Alexa, turn on / off the Heater.”
“Alexa, set the Heater to <XX> degrees.”
“Alexa, increase/decrease the heater (by <XX> degrees).”
“Alexa, turn on / off the fan.”
“Alexa, set the fan to <XX> percent.”

For MagIQtouch smart home integration support please email: magiqvoice@seeleyinternational.com 
For more information on Seeley International please visit: https://www.seeleyinternational.com/index.php
